MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:31pm. Our engineers are on their way to Dovecote substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20pm on  Saturday, 23 January 2021
